p: First, to assess the feasibility of milk tanker samples, a pilot survey was initially conducted. Fifty milk tanker samples and 220 bulk tank milk samples on each farm were collected at a CS on Sept. 18, 2016. Second, a regional survey was conducted on nearly all 348 dairy farms in Ibaraki Prefecture. In this survey, 79 milk tanker samples and 363 bulk tank milk samples from each dairy farm were collected at two CSs on May 30, 2017 and on July 19, 2017. If virus-positive or antibody-positive samples were detected, follow-up tests were conducted on each farm, based on the screening scheme ( Fig. 1).
